name: Range
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range
description:
Range

Represents a range of rows in a table or index. A range has a start key and an end key. These keys can be open or closed, indicating if the range includes rows with that key.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

key_range = db.range 1, 100
results = db.read "users", [:id, :name], keys: key_range

results.rows.each do |row|
  puts "User #{row[:id]} is #{row[:name]}"
end

methods.name: begin
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range#begin
methods.description: Returns the object that defines the beginning of the range.

methods.name: end
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range#end
methods.description: Returns the object that defines the end of the range.

methods.name: initialize
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range#initialize
methods.description: Creates a Spanner Range. This can be used in place of a Ruby Range when needing to exclude the beginning value.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

key_range = Google::Cloud::Spanner::Range.new 1, 100
results = db.read "users", [:id, :name], keys: key_range

results.rows.each do |row|
  puts "User #{row[:id]} is #{row[:name]}"
end

params.name: beginning
params.description:
The object that defines the beginning of the
range.

params.name: ending
params.description: The object that defines the end of the range.

params.name: exclude_begin
params.description: Determines if the range excludes its beginning value. Default is false.

params.name: exclude_end
params.description: Determines if the range excludes its ending value. Default is false.

methods.name: exclude_begin?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range#exclude_begin?
methods.description: Returns true if the range excludes its beginning value.

methods.name: exclude_end?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Range#exclude_end?
methods.description: Returns true if the range excludes its end value.
